metadata.synopsis: Voss tells players he will meet them at the final battle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically after the dialog where you show Voss the hammer. He says this line as they are preparing a spell to leave and leave right after the line.

1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
1.text: When you break Prince Orpheus free, his psionic cry will alert us.

0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
0.text: I will fly to your side. Together, we will fell the elder brain and thwart the Grand Design.
